name: automation-testing
description: hybrid automation tool for pupeteer and selenium with mocha-chai

scripts.test: npm run test:puppeteer && npm run test:selenium_chrome && npm run test:selenium_firefox
scripts.test:parallel: mocha --opts mocha.opts -- puppeteer & mocha --opts mocha.opts -- selenium_chrome & mocha --opts mocha.opts -- selenium_firefox
scripts.test:puppeteer: mocha --opts mocha.opts -- puppeteer && mocha --require babel-core/register test/sendMail.spec.js --timeout 30s -- puppeteer
scripts.test:selenium_chrome: mocha --opts mocha.opts -- selenium_chrome && mocha --require babel-core/register test/sendMail.spec.js --timeout 30s -- selenium_chrome
scripts.test:selenium_firefox: mocha --opts mocha.opts -- selenium_firefox && mocha --require babel-core/register test/sendMail.spec.js --timeout 30s -- selenium_firefox
